channel.title: Divine-X - Fullscreen / 8+ Bosses / 7+ Minigames / Quests / Achievements
channel.description:
[CENTER][CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Pwtk1NU.png[/img][/CENTER]
Divine-X is a 317 Economy server. The server is lead by mature & fully dedicated team. We have an awesome staff team who is always avaliable to help you. Divine-X offers you a widespread content all around the map featuring different Quests & Achivements to complete. At Divine-X, we even have fully working highscores for you to compete with other players. We strive for a perfect gaming experience & even the smallest details are important to us. Our key is to provide as bug-free and as enjoyable content as possible!
[URL=http://divine-x.com/index.php]Official Site[/URL] [URL=http://divine-x.com/index.php]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://www.divine-x.com/vote]Vote for Divine-X[/URL] [URL=http://www.divine-x.com/highscores]Divine-X Highscores[/URL] [URL=http://www.divine-x.com/downloads/client.jar]Download Client[/URL]
[SPOILER=Divine-X Features] [B]- Features -[/B] Loading 602 Data with 474 Maps Fullscreen/Resizable/Fixed F-Keys Zooming Highscores Vote System Auto Donate Awesome Donator benefit All skills working Active community Frequent Updates Stable / No Lag Quests Perfected Slayer system. Flawless combat Helpful & Active staff Full 63 Wave jad Good economy Good drop rates [B]- Bosses - [/B] Godwars KBD Dagannoths Kalphite Queen Corporal Beast Tormented Demons Chaos Elemental Barrelchest
[B]- Minigames -[/B] Duel Arena Barrows Fight Pits Fight Cave Ranging Guild Warriors Guild[/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Divine-X Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GIAlcDm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/56771888975992c9057e815be3ca8d68.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RrKZhUz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dJnvW5D.png[/img] [/SPOILER] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tc6Ys5pb5u0 [/CENTER]
